segment.source: List animations let you insert or remove single or multiple items from a collection, such as a photo album or a list of search results.
segment.target: List animations let you insert or remove single or multiple items from a collection, such as a photo album or a list of search results.

segment.source: Add and delete animations in UWP apps
segment.target: Add and delete animations in UWP apps

segment.source: Add and delete animations
segment.target: Add and delete animations

segment.source: List animations let you insert or remove single or multiple items from a collection, such as a photo album or a list of search results.
segment.target: List animations let you insert or remove single or multiple items from a collection, such as a photo album or a list of search results.

segment.source: Important APIs
segment.target: Important APIs

segment.source: AddDeleteThemeTransition class
segment.target: AddDeleteThemeTransition class

segment.source: Do's and don'ts
segment.target: Do's and don'ts

segment.source: Use list animations to add a single new item to an existing set of items.
segment.target: Use list animations to add a single new item to an existing set of items.

segment.source: For example, use them when a new email arrives or when a new photo is imported into an existing set.
segment.target: For example, use them when a new email arrives or when a new photo is imported into an existing set.

segment.source: Use list animations to add several items to a set at one time.
segment.target: Use list animations to add several items to a set at one time.

segment.source: For example, use them when you import a new set of photos to an existing collection.
segment.target: For example, use them when you import a new set of photos to an existing collection.

segment.source: The addition or deletion of multiple items should happen at the same time, with no delay between the action on the individual objects.
segment.target: The addition or deletion of multiple items should happen at the same time, with no delay between the action on the individual objects.

segment.source: Use add and delete list animations as a pair.
segment.target: Use add and delete list animations as a pair.

segment.source: Whenever you use one of these animations, use the corresponding animation for the opposite action.
segment.target: Whenever you use one of these animations, use the corresponding animation for the opposite action.

segment.source: Use list animations with a list of items to which you can add or delete one element or group of elements at once.
segment.target: Use list animations with a list of items to which you can add or delete one element or group of elements at once.

segment.source: Don't use list animations to display or remove a container.
segment.target: Don't use list animations to display or remove a container.

segment.source: These animations are for members of a collection or set that is already being displayed.
segment.target: These animations are for members of a collection or set that is already being displayed.

segment.source: Use pop-up animations to show or hide a transient container on top of the app surface.
segment.target: Use pop-up animations to show or hide a transient container on top of the app surface.

segment.source: Use content transition animations to display or replace a container that is part of the app surface.
segment.target: Use content transition animations to display or replace a container that is part of the app surface.

segment.source: Don't use list animations on an entire set of items.
segment.target: Don't use list animations on an entire set of items.

segment.source: Use the content transition animations to add or remove an entire collection within your container.
segment.target: Use the content transition animations to add or remove an entire collection within your container.
